subject: Re: [junit] Writing a test for a PrintStream and for a log rotation method
msgSnippet: ... I m not sure what you mean. What are you worried would break? Could you write a test for that? -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
Asif Sattar wrote:
> Great tip Joe, thanks! Just one question about it, my
> printstream variable is a global private static one.
> Therefore, once it's set in the log rotation method it gets
> used in the other methods. If I were to pass it in as a
> parameter what changes should I make to make sure the same
> reference is maintained?

I'm not sure what you mean. What are you worried would break? Could you
write a test for that?
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
